summary: pointe and purpose
title: pointe and purpose
body:
read it on the AO3 at http://bit.ly/2Rpj2mQ

by knlalla

prompted by the lovely anon that sent “concept: dan learned some basic ballet moves for distraction once / now he dances a little bit sometimes when he’s doing stuff around the flat / like twirling a little in place or something / he doesn’t notice he’s doing it / phil does and thinks its adorable”

thank you dear and i hope you enjoy!

blog.name: phanfeed-ao3
blog.title: Phanfiction!
blog.description:
!!! READ THE FAQ BEFORE SENDING ME AN ASK !!!

Mobile Links

This blog is autoposts anything that gets put in the Dan Howell/Phil Lester tag on Archive of Our Own (AO3).

Sometimes the applet on IFTT I use straight up breaks. I don't recommend turning on notifications for this blog. Links don't work on mobile.

Admin: Ozzy (foolishdeadbeat)

summary: i keep fucking. having these vivid ass dreams where either dan or phil have a female partner and it shakes me to my core. like...
body: i keep fucking. having these vivid ass dreams where either dan or phil have a female partner and it shakes me to my core. like this is my deepest fear. last night it was the spontaneous news that dan was getting married to this woman and i cried for hours and i was SO fucking relieved when i woke up

summary: hey y’all and especially gif-makers, i have a very serious question and i genuinely want to know the answer - does it bother you...
body:
hey y’all and especially gif-makers, i have a very serious question and i genuinely want to know the answer - does it bother you when i or other blogs use a bunch of your gifs (from the gif search!!) in a post/to answer an ask? bc @phannie brought it up in a post and i can absolutely see their pov on it and i know some anons were agreeing - and like, fair point, nobody can really consent to whether or not they show up in the gif search

so like please let me know, like i would much rather not upset anyone? i know the gifs are credited to the poster but i would also much rather not use them if it’s genuinely something that bothers the creators!!! y’all put so much effort into what you do and i don’t want to trivialize that

for creators, a poll (x) or like send me asks or messages or smth

reblog.comment:

blog.name: dramaphan
blog.title: Yo I Comment On The Drama When Shit Hits The Fan
blog.description:
Phandom drama? It's more likely than you think.

.

My ask box is always open if you need a place to be dramatic, share theories, conspiracies, opinions, or general grievances. Fire away, my babies. Nothing is off limits. (Except for the things that are.)

.

Icon by phanniephobic, header by cinnamonnutlester

summary: Why do you think they’re gonna move this year?
question: Why do you think they’re gonna move this year?
answer: Just a hunch. I feel like they’re entering a new stage in their lives, and with that, I feel like more permanent living arrangements will follow.

summary: about the vday video, when it got unprivated in 2011, d&p went directly to the people who were the first ones to watch it and...
question: about the vday video, when it got unprivated in 2011, d&p went directly to the people who were the first ones to watch it and the ones who were discussing it (the LiveJournal slash community), and they privately asked them not to mention it anywhere archive(.)li/giZRp/7f868e8c6292d2df077b15a26ddb3f08f1a2fcea(.)png basically I'm talking about the morality of it, rather than about how you think the discourse is fair game because it's out there anyway. it got unprivated without their consent
answer: That link isn’t working for me. But, I do believe they probably did ask people not to speak of it at the time. I guess the way I see it, you’re never going to get rid of it. You can never erase the fact that it happened. Even if everyone in the world stays tight-lipped and hush hush, there are still going to be people watching, people sharing, and people talking about it. It’s not this big secret. Which is why I’m not totally against discussing it. Like I said, i don’t encourage people to reupload or share it or use clips of it and I don’t even want to encourage the “is it real or a joke” discussion. But, I’m not against being real about the fact that it happened. If that makes sense. That’s just my own opinion of course, and you’re free to have a different one.

You can never erase the fact that it happened. Even if everyone in the world stays tight-lipped and hush hush, there are still going to be people watching, people sharing, and people talking about it. It’s not this big secret. Which is why I’m not totally against discussing it. Like I said, i don’t encourage people to reupload or share it or use clips of it and I don’t even want to encourage the “is it real or a joke” discussion. But, I’m not against being real about the fact that it happened. If that makes sense. That’s just my own opinion of course, and you’re free to have a different one.

blog.name: dramaphan
blog.title: Yo I Comment On The Drama When Shit Hits The Fan
blog.description:
Phandom drama? It's more likely than you think.

.

My ask box is always open if you need a place to be dramatic, share theories, conspiracies, opinions, or general grievances. Fire away, my babies. Nothing is off limits. (Except for the things that are.)

.

Icon by phanniephobic, header by cinnamonnutlester

summary: I'm watching the interactive introverts stage show and it's interesting how much of it was scripted and it's making me realise...
question: I'm watching the interactive introverts stage show and it's interesting how much of it was scripted and it's making me realise just how good of a public speaker Dan is! He's speaks so naturally and isn't too bad at ad libbing!

reblog.comment: The boy is a good talker.

trail.content_raw: The boy is a good talker.
trail.content: The boy is a good talker.

blog.name: phanfictioncatalogue
blog.title: phanfiction catalogue
blog.description:
mobile users, click here!

please refer to our FAQ first.

Our goal is to create an alphabetized library of every phanfiction in the phandom. Besides that, we compile masterlists of different genres that are scheduled for posting every few days, and help find fics that have been mislocated.

summary: Coming Out (5) Masterlist
title: Coming Out (5) Masterlist
body:
part one, part two, part three, part four

A Christmas Miracle (ao3) - scifi

Summary: Dan tells his grandma about Phil.

An announcement (sort of) (ao3) - PerseveringIntegrity

Summary: There’s something that’s been on Dan’s mind lately, and it’s finally time to tell the world.

… And The Internet Lost Their Minds - yoursecretphanblog

Summary: Dan never meant to. It just slipped out.

An Unexpected Live Show - phananddragonsfics

Summary: YouTube Notification: danisnotinteresting is now LIVE! / A.k.a. A Dan and Phil joint live-show that no one was expecting.

Caught - analester

Summary: “Phil, why are you sitting in a different location?” Phil reads off of the chat accidentally. Not even five minutes into the show and he’s already seeming suspicious. Nice. Phil’s cheeks tint pink and he hopes that it goes unnoticed to the people watching. He feels like he should care more about what he looks like, especially since Dan is kneeling just out of shot, mouthing over Phil’s growing length.

Coming Out (ao3) - oddlyme

Summary: little!dan accidentally slipping into little space around one of their friends (like Louise or Peej) and them having to explain it and it being all cute and fluffy!

Coming Out W/The Help Of Phil (ao3) - LauraLittlemiss

Summary: Dan wants to come out. Might as well ask his best friend if he’ll pretend to be his boyfriend.

Dan… I’m Live Streaming - amazinganxietyisnotonfire

Summary: Dan accidentally saunters in, naked, and kisses Phil on YouNow because he thinks he’s filming a video not streaming.

Days in the Married Life of Dan and Phil (ao3) -  umathurmanjustwatchedmehavesex

Summary: It’s November 2017, Dan and Phil have just tied the knot, and Dan and Phil decide to upload videos centred around coming out and their life as a married couple.

In Simplest Terms (ao3) - okaydan

Summary: Dan puts his feelings, and who he is, into simplest terms.

It didn’t have to be said - imasexuallyambiguousnerd

Summary: Dan decides to come out to his parents about him and Phil.

Mind Your Manners (ao3) - watergator

Summary: Dan (kinda) comes out to his brother.

No More Hiding (ao3) - MaeTaurus

Summary: Dan and Phil are both tired of hiding and are finally ready to be more open with their viewers about their relationship. Phil surprises Dan with tickets to see London’s biggest fireworks display on New Year’s Eve, the first time they’ll be going out in public to celebrate the holiday. Phil has another surprise for Dan in a small, black box.

Oh, Emily - pasteldanhowells

Summary: In which Dan and Phil haven’t come out to their viewers yet but have a daughter, and she basically outs them accidentally during a live show.

Thicker Than Water - phandomsub

Summary: Daniel isn’t handling his punishment well, and his mother doesn’t understand.

Unapologetically His (ao3) - LiterallyAmazingPhan

Summary: Dan shows off Phil to his friends and family.

Venus’s Looking Glass - auroraphilealis

Summary: Shy!punk!Phil has been crushing on confident!pastel!Dan for years now, but he’s never felt comfortable enough to do anything about it until he accidentally comes out to his brother Martyn, who is nothing but supportive. It’s Martyn’s idea to woo Dan with flowers - only, he didn’t mean do it anonymously.

You’re My Home (ao3) - outphan

Summary: Interactive Introverts is over, Dan and Phil are home. To mark that occasion, they get matching tattoos.

You Won’t Be Alone - avatarin3d

Summary: In which Dan comes out to his parents in 2010 and things don’t go as planned.
